Name: Tortuga Dominions
ReputationStatements: Listen scum, unless you want me to cut your flesh slowly from your body and feed it to the crows, you'd better stop attacking us and start helping us.  Here's a contract, take it!
Don't even get me started on what we'll do to you and your shitty little company if you piss us us any more.  Take this contract and stop fighting us, or else!
Commander, Death's Consorts don't mind a bit of a dust up to get the blood pumping, but let's not cross swords again eh?  Take up this contract, and let's plunder together eh.
So, you want to join the best pirate organization in known space eh?  Okay, here's a simple task for you to begin to prove yourself.
Hello Commander, we've only just begun plundering together, but you've proven yourself capable.  Here's a juicy contract for you, with a good amount of loot.
Ahoy Commander, word of your deeds has even reached Lady Death's ear.  I've got another job for you, one where a good bit of loot to be had.
Ahoy Matey!  Lady Death sends her compliments.  She has authorized me to pass this contract on to you, as a sign of her faith in your abilities.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done matey!  You finished off that contract easily, and your share of the loot is already in your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You'd never make it in the Tortuga Dominions with that sort of cowardly attitude!  I'll partially pay you this time, but complete the damn contract next time, or else!
BadFaithFailureStatements: I should cut out your heart and enslave your entire crew for failing this simple task.  Leave, before I decide to do it!
Description: The Tortuga Dominion is a small collective of assorted pirates, brigands and other bandits that are lead by Dame 'Lady Death' Paula Trevaline and her 'Deaths Consorts'
